column4: So   @British_Airways    continue to drive for lower customer satisfaction. This time by instructing staff to pull out Group 3 from 2-3 queue before boarding. The staff member was even more embarrassed than us. Shame on you BA
Never again.  This hellhole is willingly flooding its once safe country with fake refugees to the detriment of its citizens.  Women are not safe in England.  May Teresa May be destroyed
